name: CAAL

scripts.release: ./node_modules/.bin/jake -q -f build.js || exit 1; ./node_modules/.bin/node-qunit-phantomjs ./test/test.html || exit 1; rm -f release.tar.gz; tar -zcf release.tar.gz lib/ css/ fonts/ docs/ index.html help.html contact.html about.html LICENSE README.md server.js;
scripts.release-notest: ./node_modules/.bin/jake -q -f build.js || exit 1; rm -f release.tar.gz; tar -zcf release.tar.gz lib/ css/ fonts/ docs/ index.html help.html contact.html about.html LICENSE README.md server.js;

authors: Jacob K. Wortmann, Jesper R. Andersen, Mathias M. Hansen, Nicklas Andersen, Simon R. Olesen, SÃ¸ren Enevoldsen
